0010110001101000 0000101100101111 1 -> sum: 0011011110011000, cout: 0
1011110100111011 1011101111001001 0 -> sum: 0111100100000100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
